name: Jacob Burdick
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Hello and thank you for this opportunity.

I am a hardworking, intelligent student looking for a job in the cannabis industry. I have worked in retail, customer service, and serving jobs for many years and have strong hospitality, customer service, and sales skills. I like to work within a team and support my coworkers to give customers the best experience possible and am adept at taking directions. I am a dedicated employee and pleasant coworker.  

I have a love for marijuana and am constantly looking for new strains to try and identify the flavors, benefits, and highs of different flowers, crumbles, waxes, and edibles. 

I think my experience in retail selling fine chocolates, food, or cocktails will translate well to budtending and my knowledge and passion for marijuana will enable me to excel at this position.

I hope you agree!
Sincerely,
Jacob Burdick
experience:
-FOOD SERVICE/COCKTAIL SERVICE | E.P.& L.P. - West Hollywood | 09/2015 - 10/2016
-SERVER/HOST/RUNNER | The Restaurant at Burdick Chocolate| 04/2013 – 12/2014,06/2011 – 09/2011
-BARISTA/RETAIL | LA Burdick Chocolate | Summer 2009, 2010, 2012
